about_the_game:
PIANO ALBUM #2
A second showing of piano-arranged music!
Featuring piano arrangements of 21 BGM tracks from Aokana: Four Rhythms Across the Blue, in addition to a vocal version of the popular Way to Fly-Ao no Kanata he- by Saki Inui (Voiced by Takamori Natsumi)



Track List:
Piano Tracks (Song Title/Arranger)
1. Meguri Au Monotachi/Ishihara Tsuyoshi
2. Takamaru Mune to Shokuyoku/Sakuma Kirara
3. Kara no Naka no Kotori/Sakuma Kirara
4. Ki no Nuketa Ramune/T･H
5. Daidassou/T･H
6. Hashire, Tobe!/Ishihara Tsuyoshi
7. Yuuyake to Ongakushitsu/T･H
8. Atatakana Hibi no Naka de/T･H
9. Hiyoku no Tori/T･H
10. Warawanai Tsuki/T･H
11. Kuroku Nebaritsuku Mono/T･H
12. Oreta Michishirube/T･H
13. Kimi ga Iru kara/Ishihara Tsuyoshi
14. Tooi Kioku/T･H
15. Ousha no Fuukaku/T･H
16. Kuuiki no Shihaisha/T･H
17. Sekai no Henkakusha/T･H
18. Mune no Okusoko
19. Ao no Kanata he/T･H (This is a different arrangement to the one featured in PIANO ALBUM #1)
20. Kentou no Akushu/T･H
21. Yuuki no Mukou ni/Ishihara Tsuyoshi
(Track 1-21 SOUND PRODUCED by SONO MAKERS)

Vocal Track
22. Way to Fly -Ao no Kanata he- Inui Saki ver./Vocals: Inui Saki (Voiced by Takamori Natsumi)
Lyrics: RUCCA
Composition: Mori Haruki (Elements Garden)
Arrangement: Hirata Yuma (Elements Garden)
Way to Fly -Ao no Kanata he- Inui Saki ver. is not a piano arrangement.
